description: Six tiled pages of the 2022 Single-Family Residential Mandatory Requirements Summary checklist. Covers all California Title 24 mandatory measures including air leakage, insulation, fenestration, HVAC, duct sealing, water heating, solar ready, battery storage ready, PV systems, indoor air quality, and plumbing fixtures. This is the mandatory compliance checklist that applies regardless of performance or prescriptive compliance path.
key_content: 2022 Single-Family Residential Mandatory Requirements Summary (6 pages tiled)
Air leakage and building envelope sealing requirements
Insulation installation quality (Grade I required, HERS verification)
Fenestration products: NFRC certification, U-factor/SHGC labels required through final inspection
Cool roof requirements for Climate Zone 8 (reflectance and thermal emittance)
High-efficacy lighting: all permanently installed luminaires must be high-efficacy
HVAC equipment sizing and efficiency requirements
Duct sealing: mastic or listed tape, duct leakage testing, HERS verification
Kitchen range hood and bathroom exhaust requirements
Water heater efficiency requirements and pipe insulation
Solar ready: minimum roof area, conduit from panel to solar zone, panel space reservation
Battery storage ready: dedicated panel space, conduit to battery location
PV system requirements for new construction (minimum size by CFA and climate zone)
Plumbing fixture flow rates per Table 150.0-H
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: specific numeric values for most requirements (composited at very small scale)
VALUE NOT LEGIBLE: checkbox completion status for individual line items
